artist: Painter: After Adriaen van der Werff; Engraver: Charles François Adrien Macret
description: Samson and Delilah in a bedroom scene, Delilah holding a cut lock of Samson's hair and showing it to an elderly woman at right; Samson asleep in foreground
inscription:

below image in black: 115 /  V Werff pinx   C.F. Macret Sculp.  /  Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain  | on sheet in pencil: 2-596
